name: Pack Opener for FUT 21
description:
Finally on iPhone!

Football card database and simulator.
Open packs and collect all the player cards!
You can find more than 17,000 cards, many badges and position change cards.
You can open an unlimited number of packs and player picks.
Build Drafts and win 4 matches in a row to earn super prizes.
Complete SBC - Squad Building Challenges.
Play Fut Champions online.
Build your squad and play online friendly match.

This application's purpose is to help its users learn how to build best squads and drafts, find out more about football players.
Important! These packs are pure fantasy - there is no connection to your FUT 21 club.
